name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _[SOUND] This lecture is about the
column6: the basic measures for _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: evaluation of text original systems.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _In this lecture
column6: we're going to discuss how we design basic _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _measures [SOUND] to quantitatively
column6: compare two original [SOUND] systems. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _This is a slide that you have seen earlier in the lecture

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: where we talk about the grand evaluation methodology.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _We can have a test collection that consists of queries
column6: documents and _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: relevance judgements.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _We can then run two systems on these da
column6: data sets to

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: quantitatively evaluate your performance.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And we raised to the question about

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: [SOUND] which settles results is better is System A better or System B better?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: [SOUND] So let's now talk about how to actually quantify their performance.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Suppose we have a total of

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: of 10 random documents in the current folder for this query.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: the relevance judgements shown on the right

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: did not include all the ten obviously.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And we have only seen three rendered documents there but

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: we can imagine there are other random documents in judging for this query.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So now
column6: intuitively we thought that _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: System A is better because it did not have much noise.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And in particular we have seen
column6: amount of three results

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: two of them are relevant but in System B we

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: have five results and only three of them are relevant.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So intuitively
column6: it looks like System A is more accurate. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And this can be captured by a matching order precision.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Where we simply compute to what extent all the retrieval results are relevant.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: If you have 100% precision that would mean all the retrieval documents are relevant.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: in this case the system A has a Precision of two out of three. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: System B as three over five.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And this shows that System A is better by Precision.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: But we also talked about System B might be preferred by

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: some other users hold like to retrieve as many relevant documents as possible.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: in that case we have to compare _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: the number of relevant documents that retrieve.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And there is an other measure called a Recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: This measures the completeness of coverage of relevant documents

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: in your retriever result.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: we just assume that there are ten relevant documents in the collection. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And here we've got two of them in System A
column6: so the recall is two out of ten. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Where as system B has got a three
column6: so it's a three out of ten. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: we can see by recall System B is better and these two _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: measures turned out to be the very basic measures for evaluating search engine.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And they are very important because they are also widely used in many other

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: testing variation problems.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _For example
column6: if you look at the applications of machine learning you tend _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: to see precision recall numbers being reported for all kinds of tasks.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Okay
column6: so now
column7: let's define these two measures more precisely and _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: these measures are to evaluate a set of retrieval documents.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: So that means we are considering that approximation

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: of a set of relevant documents.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _We can distinguish it four cases
column6: depending on the situation of a document. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _A document that can be retrieved or not retrieved
column6: right? _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Because we're talking about the set of result.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: The document can be also relevant or

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _not relevant
column6: depending on whether the user thinks this is a useful document. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: we can now have counts of documents in each of the four categories. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We can have a to represent the number of documents that are retrieved and

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _relevant
column6: b for documents that are not retrieved but relevant

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: with this table

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _As the
column6: ratio of

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: retriever documents A to the total number of retriever documents.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So this is just you know
column6: a divided by the sum of a and c. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: The sum of this column.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Signal recall is defined by dividing a by the sum of a and b.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So that's
column6: again
column7: to divide a by the sum of the rule

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _All right
column6: so we going to see precision and recall is all focused on _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _looking at the a
column6: that's the number of retrieval relevant documents

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: we're going to use different denominators.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Okay
column6: so what would be an ideal result? _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Well
column6: you can able to see in ideal case we have precision and recall

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: to be 1.0 that means we have got 1% of all the random documents in our results.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And all the results that we return are relevant.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: [INAUDIBLE] There's no single not relevant document returned.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _The reality however
column6: high recall tends to be associated with low precision And _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: you can imagine why that is the case.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: As you go down the distant to try to get as many relevant actions as possible.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _You tend to in time a lot of non relevant documents
column6: so the precision goes down. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Look at this set
column6: can also be defined by a cutoff in a ranked list. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _That's why
column6: although these two measures are defined for a set of retrieved _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _documents
column6: they are actually very useful for evaluating a ranked list. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: They are the fundamental measures in tension retrieval and many other tasks.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We often are interested in to the precision up to ten documents for

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: web search.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _This means we look at the

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: how many documents among the top results are actually relevant.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: this is a very meaningful measure

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: because it tells us how many relevant documents a user can expect to see.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _On the first page of search results
column6: where they typically show ten results. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: precision and recall are

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: we need to use them to further evaluate a search engine but

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: they are the building blocks really.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We just to say that there tends to be a trade off between precision and recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: naturally it would be interesting to [SOUND] combine them and _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _here's one measure that's often used
column6: called f measure. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And it's harmonic mean of precision and recall
column6: it's defined on this slide. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So you can see it first computed

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: inverse of R and P here and then it would be

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _interpreted to by using a co
column6: coefficients. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Depending on the parameter Beta and

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: after some transformation we can easily see it would be of this form.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And in many cases it's just a combination of precision and recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And
column6: and Beta is a parameter that's often set to one. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: It can control the emphasis on precision or recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _When we set

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _beta to one we end up by having a special case of F measure
column6: often called F1. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _This is a popular measure
column6: that is often used as a combined precision and recall. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And the formula looks very simple it's just this
column6: here. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now it's easy to see that if you have
column6: a larger precision or _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: larger recall than F measure would be high.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _But what's interesting is that
column6: the trade off between precision and _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _recall
column6: is captured in an interesting way in F1. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: in order to understand that
column8: can first look at the natural question. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Why not just the

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: combining them using a simple arithmetic mean as a [INAUDIBLE] here.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: That would be likely the most natural way of combining them.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: what do you think? _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _If you want to think more
column6: you can pause the media. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: So why is this not as good as F1?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Or what's the problem with this?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: if you think about the arithmetic mean

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _you can see that this is the sum of
column6: of multiple terms. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _In this case
column6: this is the sum of precision and recall. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _In the case of the sum
column6: the total value tends to be dominated by the large values. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _That means if you have a very high P or a very high R

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _then you really don't care about the
column6: whether the other varies is low. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: the whole sum would be high. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: this is not the desirable because one can easily have a perfect recall. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We can have a perfect recall is it?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Can you imagine how?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: It's probably very easy to imagine that

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _we simply retrieve all the document in the collection

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: then we have a perfect recall and this will give us 0.5 as the average.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _But search results are clearly not very useful for users

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _even though the
column6: the average using this formula would be relatively high. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now
column6: in contrast
column7: you can see F1 will reward a case where precision and _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: recall are roughly but similar.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: it would paralyze a case where you have extremely high _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: matter for one of them.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _So
column6: this means F1 encodes a different trade off between that. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Now this example shows actually
column6: a very important methodology here. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _When we try to solve a problem
column6: you might naturally think of one solution. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Let's say
column6: in this case

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: But it's important that not to settle on this solution.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: It's important to think whether you have other ways to combine them.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And once you think about the multiple variance.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: It's important to analyze their difference and

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: then think about which one makes more sense.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _In this case

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: if you think more carefully you will feel that if one problem makes more sense.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: Then the simple arithmetic mean.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Although in other cases
column6: there may be

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _But in this case
column6: the arithmetic mean

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _But if you don't pay attention to these subtle differences

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _you might just
column6: take an easy way to combine them and then go ahead with it. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _And here later you'll find that
column6: hm
column7: the measure doesn't seem to work well. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Right so
column6: at this methodology is actually very important in _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: general in solving problem and try to think about the best solution.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _Try to understand that the problem
column6: very well and then know why _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _you needed this measure
column6: and why you need to combine precision and recall. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And then use that to guide you in finding a good way to solve the problem.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _To summarize
column6: we talk about precision

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: are the retrieval results all relevant?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _We'll also talk about the recall
column6: which addresses the question

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: have all the relevant documents been retrieved?

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: These two are the two basic measures in testing retrieval in variation.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: _They are are used for
column6: for many other tasks as well. _

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We'll talk about F measure as a way to combine precision and recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: We also talked about the trade off between precision and recall.

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: And this turns out to depend on the users search tasks and

name: 3 - 5 - 2.5 Evaluation of TR Systems- Basic Measures (00-12-54).srt
text: we'll discuss this point more in the later lecture.
